solution_line_template: The total cost for the vacation rentals will be ${airbnb_cost} + ${car_rental_cost} = $<<{airbnb_cost}+{car_rental_cost}={total_rental_cost}>>{total_rental_cost}.
The cost per person will be ${total_rental_cost} / {num_people} = $<<{total_rental_cost}/{num_people}={cost_per_person}>>{cost_per_person}.
